mapper.sql: SELECT i.image_id, COALESCE(metadata->>'import-path', i.filename) AS filename, i.taken, i.modified, i.entered, i.summary, i.description, i.credit, ST_AsGeoJSON(i.geog::GEOMETRY, 5, 0) AS geojson, geog_accuracy, ispublic, i.metadata::text
mapper.select: FROM image AS i WHERE i.image_id = #{id}
SELECT credit, taken, summary, description, geojson, accuracy, tags, ispublic FROM images_common(${item})

SELECT i.image_id, i.summary, i.description, i.credit, TO_CHAR(i.modified, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modified, TO_CHAR(i.taken, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS taken, ST_X(i.geog::GEOMETRY) AS longitude, ST_Y(i.geog::GEOMETRY) AS latitude, geog_accuracy AS accuracy, t.tags FROM image AS i LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT it.image_id, STRING_AGG(t.name, ', ') AS tags FROM image_tag AS it JOIN tag AS t ON t.tag_id = it.tag_id GROUP BY it.image_id ) AS t ON t.image_id = i.image_id WHERE i.summary IS NOT NULL AND i.taken IS NOT NULL AND i.description IS NOT NULL AND i.ispublic AND i.geog IS NOT NULL AND ST_Dimension(i.geog::GEOMETRY) = 0 ORDER BY image_id
mapper.update: UPDATE image SET taken = #{taken}, credit = #{credit}, summary = #{summary}, description = #{description}, geog = ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON(#{geojson}), 4326)::GEOGRAPHY, geog_accuracy = #{accuracy}, ispublic = #{ispublic} WHERE image_id = #{id}
